short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fix the login screen for the Newcastle Perm. Stops the randomising of the keypad and allows direct entry into the password field

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Newcastle Permanent Building Society Ltd uses a painful process to login to net banking. You must enter your password with the on screen keyboard with the key locations randomised.

This extension unrandomises the keypad so it appears in the correct order and allows direct entry into the password field without using the on screen keyboard.

NOTE: This is not an official Newcastle Permanent extension.
